text: [MUSIC] The demand on
our energy resources is constantly arising,
and is having tremendous impact on our environment.
This is one of the most important issues facing us now.
The need to decarbonize on a local, national,
and global platform are the driving force to innovate the energy sector.
We have been challenged to transform the way we generate, store,
distribute, and use energy while still supporting global economic growth.
Stanford's Energy Innovation and Emerging Technologies program,
reflects the complex in ever-changing landscape,
as this issue has evolved so has our program.
This multi-disciplinary curriculum is strong in
entrepreneurial creativity and scientific excellence.
Our goal is to demystify the landscape from many angles,
help you accelerate your impact in renewable energy.
You will develop a bird's eye view of the energy systems and
specific domain knowledge to prepare you to be part of the solution,
as well as understand the complex landscape of policy,
finance, behavioral science, and clean energy sustainability.
All taught by Stanford's top faculty and
Silicon Valley researchers who have pioneered discoveries in clean tech.
The EIET program is on the forefront of renewable energy technologies.
We have witnessed emerging markets such as
with electric vehicles and inexpensive natural gas.
We expect to see much more in our lifetime with modernizing the electric grid,
enabling clean electricity 24-7,
realizing zero net energy buildings and more.
I invite you to roll up your sleeves and join us to develop
the solutions and take part in innovating solutions that integrate economics,
business, policy, and technology.
Whether you're currently working in the space or aspire to one day,
this program can be tailored to fit your life.
You can continue to work and take online classes that fit your schedule,
and among the many courses available,
This is an opportunity to level up your career or transition to a new direction.
The skills you will learn here are firmly rooted in what is taking place now in
energy innovation and pushes the conversation
forward to what could be taking place in the near future.
Enroll now and contribute your passion and talent to the solution.
